entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:58 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whistler 8:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 8:09 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:09 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 8:09 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
